divs: Sighting DetailsAt 6:48 pm object appeared hovering then moved southeast slowly. Observed object disappear behind the mountain known as high knob. Object was round and glowed white continuously. silent movement and remained steady in a path...moved slowly.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Norton
There were no other sightings in Norton on or around November 6th 2011
Summary: At 6:48 pm object appeared hovering then moved southeast slowly
